attractions.name: Great Falls Park
attractions.description: Spectacular waterfalls and hiking trails along the Potomac River. Part of the National Park Service with stunning views and picnic areas.

attractions.name: Clemyjontri Park
attractions.description: Unique accessible playground with colorful equipment, carousel, and picnic areas. Designed for children of all abilities.

attractions.name: Scott's Run Nature Preserve
attractions.description: Beautiful forested area with waterfalls and hiking trails. A peaceful retreat with diverse plant life and scenic overlooks.

attractions.name: McLean Community Center
attractions.description: Cultural hub offering arts programs, performances, and community events. Features the Alden Theatre and art galleries.

attractions.name: Salona Village
attractions.description: Historic 19th-century estate with beautiful grounds. Once home to a Revolutionary War hero and now a public park.

attractions.name: McLean Farmers Market
attractions.description: Local vendors offering fresh produce, artisanal goods, and prepared foods. Open seasonally on Fridays.

attractions.name: Langley Fork Park
attractions.description: Sports complex with fields, playgrounds, and walking trails. Home to McLean Little League and other community sports.

attractions.name: The Alden Theatre
attractions.description: Premier venue for live performances in McLean. Hosts concerts, plays, and cultural events throughout the year.
